name: Snickerdoodle Cake with Streusel Topping
author: chikalin
summary: A cinnamon and sugar snickerdoodle cake with a crumb topping. Also makes great cupcakes!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix 2 tablespoons white sugar and 2 teaspoons cinnamon together and sprinkle 1/2 of the mixture into the bottom of the greased baking pan
Save remaining 1/2 and set aside for sprinkling over cake batter
Cream together sugar, butter, and vanilla extract with an electric mixer in a large bowl
Sift together all-purpose flour, cinnamon, baking powder, and salt in a separate bowl
Stir into the egg mixture in batches, alternating with milk
Pour batter into the prepared baking pan
Sprinkle with reserved cinnamon and sugar mixture
Mix brown sugar and cake flour together in a bowl until well combined
Cut in butter using a pastry blender; work mixture until crumbly to create streusel
Sprinkle streusel on top of cake
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 35 to 40 minutes
